product_highlights: Leading industry collaboration for sustainable packaging
Comprehensive resources and best practices for packaging sustainability
Focus on circular economy principles for packaging
Multi-stakeholder approach to sustainable packaging solutions
notes: The Sustainable Packaging Coalition is a leading industry collaboration focused on sustainable packaging solutions. They provide guidance, resources, and tools for cosmetics brands seeking to improve packaging sustainability, including the widely-adopted How2Recycle labeling program. Their multi-stakeholder approach brings together brands, suppliers, and recyclers to advance circular economy principles in packaging.
